name: 林聰德
objective:
1.Drafting/drawing theory and practices
2.Dimensioning and tolerancing
3.Specifications of common mechanical components
4.2D CAD
5.3D CAD
schedule:
第 1 週：上課規定及 AutoCAD 環境簡介。
第 2~8 週: 2D 繪製、修改、圖層等工具介紹及繪圖練習。
第 9 週：期中考
第 10~14 週：註解、圖塊、性質等工具介紹及繪圖練習。
第 15~17 週: 3D 環境介紹、塑型及實體編輯等工具介紹及繪圖練習。
第 18 週：期末考
Week 1: Class regulations and an introduction to the AutoCAD environment.
Week 2~8: 2D drawing, modification, layers, and other tools introduction and drawing practice.
Week 9: Mid-term exam
Weeks 10-14: Introduction to tools such as annotations, blocks, properties, and drawing exercises.
Weeks 15-17: Introduction to the 3D environment, modeling and solid editing tools, and drawing practice.
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
期中、期末各占 30%，平時 (出席率、作業及上課參與度) 占 40%
The mid-term and final exams each account for 30%, and the usual scores (including attendance, homework, and class participation) account for 40%
materials:
電腦輔助繪圖 AutoCAD 2020 (全華圖書) 王雪娥、陳進煌編著
Computer-Aided Drawing AutoCAD 2020 (Publisher: 全華圖書) Edited by 王雪娥、陳進煌
